entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • API proposal: Compilation.GetDeterministicKey #57162
    17.1
  • CS0103 fixer for missing LHS of assignment incorrectly suggests turning missing variable into a type name. #57157
  • Test plan for "newlines in interpolations" #57154
    17.1
  • Array Initializer into class property throws null reference exception #57153
  • csc failed while building (Span<T> element comparing) #57148
    17.1
  • Proposal: Record applied/cancelled status of code action dialogs in telemetry #57147
  • BackgroundAnalysisScope enhancements #57146
    17.1
  • Upgrading VS build gives CS1668 in existing console windows #57143
  • Disallow null-suppression operator `!` applies to value type contexts #57142
    17.1

Closed

  • Remove warning suppressions from EditorFeatures.Cocoa project #48871
    Backlog
  • Create a view like Call Hierarchy for Data Flow Analysis (aka Value Tracking) #25994
    Backlog
  • CS0165 generated from a case where definite assignment seems satisfied. #57141
    17.1
  • extern alias and source generators #54073
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Build more projects during source-build #57165
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding some additional tests and asserts #57164
    Area-IDE
  • Handle 'out'. Add some metadata decoding. #57163
    Area-Compilers
  • Draft #57161
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure we don't throw when we filter an incomplete list to be empty #57160
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Resolve Microsoft.DotNet prebuilts for source-build #57159
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Move skeleton ref caching to ProjectStates #57158
    Area-IDE
  • Merge 17.0-vs-deps to 17.0 #57156
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Record status for "newlines in interpolations" #57155
    Area-Compilers, Documentation
  • Avoid NFE telemetry for normal cancellation scenarios #57151
    Area-IDE, 17.1.P1
  • Document break for negative Length tests #57149
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Test, New Feature - List Patterns
  • Fix QuickInfo on dot of member access #57145
    Area-IDE, 17.1
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57144
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Implement an LspWorkspaceManager and modify how we fork documents in LSP. #57140
    Area-IDE
  • Completion options4 #57139
    Area-IDE, Needs UX Triage
  • Add Visual Studio 2022 Editor Color Scheme #57138
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required

Merged

  • Add breaking changes doc for .NET 7 #57152
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Add new high memory events for releasing Roslyn caches #54850
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove #pragma suppressions from EditorFeatures.Cocoa #56974
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Moving WinForms Editor Factory logic to WinForms #57133
    Area-IDE, Next
  • RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan optimization for stackalloc #57123
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Support 'ref' type arguments in delegates #57135
    Area-Compilers
  • Simplify the Lambda Functions #51731
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57150
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to release/dev17.0-vs-deps #57115
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move stack allocations to start of the method to avoid repeated allocations in loops #57130
    Area-Compilers
  • Removed collapse for namespace level #57125
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Allow us to dispose batches asynchronously #53768
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #57136
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57137
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #57166
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Pass completion options explicitly throughout the implementation of completion providers #57058
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Ensure new files are formatted based on the right language version #57119
    Area-IDE
  • Fix import reader #57117
    Area-IDE
  • StackFrame Parser/Lexer as EmbeddedLanguage #56957
    Area-IDE
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Async lightbulb performance improvement for compiler analyzer execution #56844
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Allow newlines in the holes inside interpolated strings #56853
    Area-Compilers, Compiler.Next
  • Obtain OutputRefFilePath from project system #55244
    Area-IDE
  • Remove the BranchId concept from teh workspace #57132
    Area-IDE
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Fix 'T is new()' crash #57091
    Area-Compilers
  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Improve `CSharpSyntaxFacts.IsValidIdentifier` performance #55510
    Area-IDE, Community, Area-Performance
  • Go To Definition from source information in PDBs #57073
    Area-IDE, UX Review Not Required
  • Honor suppression on tuple element in switch #57118
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, 17.1
  • [DNM] Testing pool provider changes - Redirect Roslyn PR to Helix Staging #56910
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove constraint check in interesting scenario for dynamic constraint checking feature #57131
    Area-Compilers
